sense.def:
A stranger
je oseba, ki je še nismo srečali.

seg.quote: Antonio was a stranger to all of us.

sense.def:
To be a stranger in a place
pomeni, da še nismo bili v določenem kraju.
To be a stranger to a situation
pomeni, da določenega položaja še nismo doživeli.

seg.quote: They are strangers in the village and lost their way in the fog.
I was a stranger to this kind of gathering.
